title: Partnership for De-Fi Adoption
description: Lack of collaboration between government regulators and the Cardano Foundation to drive mass adoption.

f6_assessments.q0: Proper cooperation with governments is important for Global adaption. It is however not true that this is not done.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is not very detailed. While some social media accounts exist the proposers don't indicate their personalities or qualifications.
f6_assessments.q2: The implementation plan and the KPIs are very vague, making it difficult to audit the progress of the project.

solution: Formal relationship Cardano Foundation - Innovatio, allowing to generate more relationships with official regulatory/development organism.
experience: Knowledge in the development of start-ups and team specialized in the legal implementation of blockchain technology in the mass market.
